Text: The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.
Purpose: The product shall be available during normal business hours.
Condition: the user has access to the client PC
Precondition: the user has access to the client PC
System_response: the system will be available 99% of the time

Text: The system shall refresh the display every 60 seconds.
Purpose: refresh the display

Text: The application shall match the color of the schema set forth by Department of Homeland Security
Purpose: match the color of the schema
Condition: set forth by Department of Homeland Security
Precondition: set forth by Department of Homeland Security

Text: If projected on a 10x10 projection screen  90% of viewers must be able to read Event / Activity data from a viewing distance of 30
Purpose: read Event / Activity data

Text: If projected the data must be understandable. On a 10x10 projection screen 90% of viewers must be able to determine that Events or Activities are occuring in current time from a viewing distance of 100
Purpose: If projected the data must be understandable.
Condition: 90% of viewers must be able to determine
Precondition: that Events or Activities are occuring in current time
Action: determine that Events or Activities are occuring in current time

Text: The product shall respond fast to keep up-to-date data in the display.
Purpose: keep up-to-date data in the display

Text: The product shall refresh the display within 500 milliseconds for 99% of new data arrivals.
Purpose: refresh the display

Text: The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.
Purpose: viewing of the graph and the data table

Text: The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.
Purpose: display Events in a vertical table by time
Action: display Events in a vertical table
System_response: display Events in a vertical table by time

Text: The system shall display the Events in a graph by time.
Purpose: display the Events in a graph by time
System_response: display the Events in a graph

Text: All business rules specified in the Disputes System shall be in compliance to the guidelines of Regulation E and Regulation Z.
Purpose: Compliance to Regulation E and Regulation Z guidelines
Trigger: Business rules specified in the Disputes System

Text: The Disputes application must maintain a detailed history of every action that a user takes on a dispute case.  This ensures a complete audit trail if questions arise later on with regard to a particular dispute case.
Purpose: maintain a detailed history of every action that a user takes on a dispute case
Trigger: questions arise later on with regard to a particular dispute case
Action: user takes an action on a dispute case
System_response: maintain a detailed history of every action

Text: All actions that modify an existing dispute case must be recorded in the case history.
Purpose: All actions that modify an existing dispute case must be recorded in the case history.
Trigger: All actions that modify an existing dispute case

Text: The Disputes System must be accessible by both internal and external users.
Purpose: The Disputes System must be accessible
Trigger: by both internal and external users

Text: The Disputes System must prevent users from accessing any dispute cases that do not belong to their cardholder base.
Purpose: prevent users from accessing any dispute cases that do not belong to their cardholder base
Trigger: users attempt to access dispute cases
Condition: dispute cases do not belong to the user's cardholder base
Precondition: user is attempting to access dispute cases
Action: users attempt to access dispute cases

Text: The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.
Purpose: facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case

Text: The Disputes System must provide different levels of access with regard to disputes case initiation and follow-up actions.
Purpose: provide different levels of access
regard to disputes case initiation and follow-up actions

Text: The Disputes System shall provide view access capability for authorized users of the application.
Purpose: view access capability for authorized users

Text: The Disputes System shall provide update access capability for authorized users of the application.
Purpose: update access capability

Text: The Disputes System must allow the users to select disputable transactions (based on the age of the transaction) from a user interface and initiate a dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification) on the selected transaction.
Purpose: allow users to select disputable transactions
Condition: based on the age of the transaction

Text: The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.
Purpose: provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case
Trigger: multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant
System_response: provide the ability to initiate a single dispute case

Text: The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request. As part of ticket retrieval creation process the system must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request. The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.
Purpose: provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request
Condition: user must enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request
Precondition: user must enter all the required information
Action: create or initiate a ticket retrieval request
prompt the user to enter all the required information
System_response: prompt the user to enter all the required information

Text: The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio.
Purpose: allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests
Trigger: user action to create a ticket retrieval request

Text: The Disputes System must prevent external users from requesting original receipts. Requests for original receipts are restricted to internal users.
Purpose: prevent external users from requesting original receipts
Condition: requests for original receipts are restricted to internal users
Precondition: requests for original receipts are restricted to internal users

Text: The Disputes System must provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of ticket retrieval request that contains the following information
Purpose: provide a confirmation to the user

Text: The Disputes System shall allow the user to create or initiate a chargeback request. The system must prompt the user to enter the required information to initiate a chargeback request. The chargeback request results in a printed chargeback notification that is sent to merchant indicating that their account will be charged back if no proof is provided that the disputed transaction is valid.
Purpose: allow the user to create or initiate a chargeback request
Trigger: user wants to initiate a chargeback request
Condition: chargeback request is initiated by the user
Precondition: user has the required information to initiate a chargeback request
Action: create or initiate a chargeback request
prompt the user to enter the required information
System_response: send a printed chargeback notification to the merchant

Text: The Disputes System must provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of a chargeback request. The confirmation must contain the following information
Purpose: provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of a chargeback request

Text: The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.
Purpose: prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests

Text: The product shall comply with corporate User Interface Guidelines
Purpose: comply with corporate User Interface Guidelines

Text: The product shall comply with corporate color scheme
Purpose: comply with corporate color scheme

Text: The appearance of the product shall appear professional
Purpose: The appearance of the product shall appear professional

Text: The software product is expected to run on Windows or Linux platforms.
Purpose: run on Windows or Linux platforms

Text: The product shall be easy to use by Adjusters and Collision Estimators. 95% of Adjusters and Collision Estimators shall find the product easy to use.
Purpose: easy to use by Adjusters and Collision Estimators

Text: The product shall increase productivity of Collision Estimators. 80% of the Collision Estimators shall agree their productivity has increase within 1 month of using the product.
Purpose: increase productivity of Collision Estimators

Text: Users shall feel satisfied using the product. 85% of all users will be satisfied with the product.
Purpose: Users shall feel satisfied using the product
Trigger: 85% of all users will be satisfied with the product

Text: The user shall easily locate instructions while using the product. User help can be found within 90% of the system.
Purpose: The user shall easily locate instructions while using the product.

Text: The search for recycled parts shall take no longer than 15 seconds. The search results shall be returned in under 15 seconds.
Purpose: The search for recycled parts shall take no longer than 15 seconds.
The search results shall be returned in under 15 seconds.
Condition: The search results shall be returned in under 15 seconds.
Precondition: The search for recycled parts shall take no longer than 15 seconds.
System_response: The search results shall be returned in under 15 seconds.

Text: The search for the preferred repair facility shall take no longer than 8 seconds. The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds
Purpose: The search for the preferred repair facility shall take no longer than 8 seconds
Trigger: The search for the preferred repair facility
Condition: The search shall take no longer than 8 seconds
Precondition: The search shall take no longer than 8 seconds
Action: The preferred repair facility is returned
System_response: The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds

Text: The recycled parts audit report shall be returned to the user within 10 seconds. The audit report shall be returned within 10 seconds.
Purpose: The recycled parts audit report shall be returned to the user within 10 seconds
Trigger: The audit report shall be returned within 10 seconds
Action: The audit report shall be returned
System_response: The audit report shall be returned within 10 seconds

Text: The preferred repair facility ratings shall be saved within 5 seconds. The save shall occur within 5 seconds.
Purpose: preferred repair facility ratings shall be saved

Text: The product shall achieve a 98% uptime. The product shall not fail more than 2% of the available online time.
Purpose: achieve a 98% uptime

Text: The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.
Purpose: The average number of recycled parts records per day shall be 50 000.

Text: For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.
Purpose: For estimators
Trigger: the product shall be able to be operated

Text: The product shall interface with the ChoiceParts system once per day.
Purpose: interface with the ChoiceParts system

Text: The maintenance of the product will fall within the established corporate maintenance windows.
Purpose: maintenance of the product

Text: The product shall be supported using the corporate support center.
Purpose: The product shall be supported

Text: Product installations and upgrades shall be handled by the middleware technology team within established launch time frames.
Purpose: Product installations and upgrades shall be handled

Text: Only adjusters can request recycled parts audit reports. No users without an adjuster role shall request recycled parts audits.
Purpose: request recycled parts audit reports

Text: The system shall accept requests for recycled parts audit reports only from users with an 'adjuster' role
Purpose: accept requests for recycled parts audit reports
Trigger: requests for recycled parts audit reports

Text: Only adjusters with a supervisor role can update preferred repair facility ratings. Users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings.
Purpose: update preferred repair facility ratings
Condition: users without the supervisor role cannot access the repair facility ratings
